HTML5 Tags

<b> and <strong>

Both of these tags will make text look bold. The second tag also describes a higher text importance than the first. Also, according to the HTML 5 specification, the <b> tag should only be used as a LAST resort when no other tag is more appropriate.

HTML : <b>bold text</b>

Result : bold text
